actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that certain interest forfeited by reason of premature cancellation of certain savings deposits shall not be included in gross income.

summary.text: Provides that interest forfeited by reason of premature cancellation of savings deposits shall not be included in gross income under the Internal Revenue Code.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that certain interest forfeited by reason of premature cancellation of certain savings deposits shall not be included in gross income.
